name: Breakfast Bowl with Marine Bottom
description:
Hand thrown from porcelain. Glazed in white with marine green bottom line as well glazed. Width is approx. 14cm.

Bowl can be used for any food, both hot and cold. Glazes are food safe and lead free.

Bowls are handmade and do not have industrial perfection, so small imperfections are all a part of these handmade pieces. Please use them with care. avoid contact with staining foods on unglazed exterior surfaces. We don't recommend putting them in the microwave, oven or dishwasher.

name: White Plate
description:

name: Coffee Cup
description:
Hand thrown from porcelain. It comes in black or lemon yellow handle. 
Cup's height is approx. 7cm.

Cup is designed for coffee but also can be used for any other beverages, both hot and cold, Glazes are food safe and lead free.

Cups are handmade and do not have industrial perfection, so small imperfections are all a part of these handmade pieces. Please use them with care. avoid contact with staining foods on unglazed exterior surfaces. We don't recommend putting them in the microwave, oven or dishwasher.

name: Red Abstract Cup
description:
Hand thrown from porcelain. Red decal patterns made by photographer Andrej Vasilenko. Every cup pattern is individually designed. Every cup is unique. Cup's height is approx. 10cm.

Cup can be used for any beverages, both hot and cold. Glazes are food safe and lead free.

Cups are handmade and do not have industrial perfection, so small imperfections are all a part of these handmade pieces. Please use them with care. avoid contact with staining foods on unglazed exterior surfaces. We don't recommend putting them in the microwave, oven or dishwasher.
